name: ufront-ufadmin
description: A simple web-based admin console for your website.  Currently supports running admin tasks and a modified version of Nicolas' spodadmin for managing your database structure and records.
releasenote: Clean up admin modules for easier re-usability. Also now by default all UFAdminModule controllers in the `ufront.ufadmin.modules` package are imported and included in the admin interface.
